DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , two-group , fixed-sequence study evaluate effect ACH-3102 Simeprevir AL-335 pharmacokinetics healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Effect ACH-3102 Simeprevir AL-335 Pharmacokinetics Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject provide write consent . 2 . Positive screen test hepatitis B , C HIV serology . Subjects previously infect HCV achieve sustained virologic response treatment ( detectable HCV RNA 6 month post treatment ) eligible . 4 . Particularly , history family history prolong QT syndrome ( e.g. , torsade de pointes ) sudden cardiac death . 7 . ECG PR > 200 m , QRS > 120 m , QTcF > 450 m , assess centrally read 12 lead ECG screen visit . 8 . One repeat measurement additional 5 minute rest permit . 10 . Evidence active infection . 11 . Unwilling abstain alcohol least 1 week prior start dose study completion visit . 12 .
